item.title: CVE-2024-31432|2024-04-15T09:31:08.683Z -- stellarwp -- restrict%20content
item.description: Missing Authorization vulnerability in StellarWP Restrict Content.This issue affects Restrict Content: from n/a through 3.2.8.
